lore.text: You cannot move for 3 minutes. Gain 24
Diamonds and 2 Soul Shards after.
Gain an unrepairable Golden Sword with
16 durabilty and Knockback X.
Gain 3 Wild Feathers that instantly
teleport you to your team's Sniffer.
Gain 3 random Enchanted books (from a
specific loot pool).
Gain 20 Bottles o' Enchanting.The first
time you reach each XP level, gain a
Diamond.
Gain a Giant Killer Bunny spawn egg.
Gain another every 5 minutes.
You can trade Copper for Soul Shards
with your Runesmith. (3 Blocks of Copper
per Soul Shard)
Gain 4 Cows, a Horse, a Leather Helmet,
Lead, Saddle, Diamond Horse armor, and
40 Gold Ingots.
Gain a Soul Shard, and another the first
time you reach every 3rd level. Gain 20
Bottles o' Enchanting
Gain a Diamond and a Gold Ingot, and
another one of each every 60 seconds.
Every 5 seconds, apply Glowing to all
enemies within 55 blocks for 15 seconds.
Gain a Netherite Ingot and Netherite
Upgrade Templates.
Gain 2 Water Buckets, 2 Lava Buckets, 4
Obsidian, and Diamond Boots with Depth
Strider II and Protection I.
Gain 8 Golden Apples.
Gain 10 max Hearts, but you cannot equip
Diamond or Netherite armor.
Whenever you kill a hostile mob, it has
a 50% chance to drop a Golden Apple.
Whenever an enemy player dies within 15
blocks of you, heal 4 hearts.
Gain a Player Tracking Compass and 12
All-Seeing Eyes.
Gain a Diamond Pickaxe, Shovel, Hoe and
Axe, all enchanted with Efficiency I.
Gain a Mace. Also, gain a Wind Charge
every 120 seconds.
Become 50% larger. Gain 10 Hearts of Max
HP.
Whenever you are below 4 hearts, gain
Resistance I.
Gain 24 Diamonds and 6 Soul Shards upon
reaching Level 20.
Start with mining fatigue for the first
8 minutes. Afterwards, gain permanent
Haste III.
Gain 2 max HP, 2 Golden Apples, 2 Soul
Shards, and 2 Diamonds.
Become smaller. (85% size)
Exciting random loot is placed into your
Ender Chest! Gain a Blaze Powder.
Gain 40 Gold Ingots and 8 Diamonds.
You jump higher and your gravity is
greatly reduced. Gain immunity to fall
damage.
Gain 16 Rails, 20 TNT, 6 Minecarts, 64
Redstone, a Flint and Steel, and Blast
Protection IV Diamond Boots.
Gain a irremovable Fungus attached to
your head (equivalent to an Leather
Helmet) that gives +1 damage.
A Diamond sword hovers above your head.
Whenever you attack, the sword has a 20%
chance to strike your target.
Gain a Diamond Chestplate and Leggings,
and an Iron Helmet and Boots.
Gain an Iron Pickaxe, Iron Shovel, and
Iron Axe with Efficiency I, 2 Books, 16
Oak Logs, 16 Steak, a Shield, and full
Iron armor.
Gain a friendly Evoker Spawn Egg. Gain
another every 10 minutes
Gain a Power II Bow and 20 arrows. Your
arrow limit is increased to 40.
Gain an Oak Boat and a Bald Head,
equivalent to a Protection III Diamond
Helmet.
Your attacks have a 10% chance to summon
a Lightning Bolt on yhour target.
Gain 4 Max Hearts. Lose 9 inventory
slots.
Gain 1 friendly Ravager Spawn Egg. Gain
another every 15 minutes.
Gain a Luck of the Sea VII Lure V
Unbreaking V Fishing rod.
